title: Dialogue, More Than Just Talk
description: Lori Devoti, multi-published author of over ten novels walks you through easy to understand and implement tips to make dialogue work for your book. Learn what dialogue can and should be doing for your book, the two things dialogue absolutely shouldn t be, plus how to fix those issues if you have them. Then learn 14 techniques that will make your dialogue pop and your characters come to life.
author: Lori Devoti
